sections.heading: Rules
sections.text: 392.66 Rules.—The department shall adopt rules pursuant to ss. 120.536(1) and 120.54 to administer this chapter. The rules must include requirements for tuberculosis treatment and provide consequences if a person who has active tuberculosis fails to comply with treatment requirements.

sections.heading: As used in this chapter, the term:(1)“Active tuberculosis” means tuberculosis disease that is demonstrated to be contagious by clinical or bacteriological evidence, or by other means as determined by rule of the department
sections.text: Tuberculosis disease is considered active until cured.(2)“County health depa
